This is Volume 5 (Should have been noted in the TITLE, not only in the description).

Are the other Volumes available?  Are the other volumes all about Greece, or are other volumes' contents about other countries (Rome, Persia, Egypt, etc)?

If it only spans the period from the battle of Marathon to the end of Periclean Athens, that is only from 490 to 431. 
This is only one volume of a larger, and famous series. Grote is a titan in the field, but is a product of his times.
